context: Cognizant went public in 1998 and was a fast-growing IT services company in 2000. The company leveraged its India-based delivery model to provide application development and maintenance services during the Y2K and dot-com boom.

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Indian IT services competitor with similar offshore delivery model

competitors.name: Wipro
competitors.notes: Indian IT services company competing in application development

competitors.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
competitors.notes: Largest Indian IT services firm, major competitor

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Global consulting and technology services leader

competitors.name: IBM Global Services
competitors.notes: Major IT services competitor with global presence

competitors.name: EDS
competitors.notes: IT services and outsourcing company, later acquired by HP

competitors.name: Satyam Computer Services
competitors.notes: Indian IT services competitor, later became Tech Mahindra
